metadata.title: Joao Nascimento
metadata.description: Software developer, chef in my home kitchen, and coffee lover.

home.description:
Also known as Nasc. I'm a software developer, chef in my home kitchen, and coffee lover.

I enjoy making things work, whether it's code or a dish.

This is my space, my corner on the internet. Here you'll find a bit of my work, my projects, and some things that interest me.

quick-note.title: A quick note
quick-note.content:
For now, everything seems a bit empty here. This is due to a restructuring process I'm undergoing, and soon I'll share more about the rationale behind it.

I invite you to come back here soon to check out the updates. See you later! 👨🏻‍💻
